actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The domovoi makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the domovoi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: alter self, invisibility

3/day each: darkness, dimension door, haste
